mapper.select: SELECT airplane.*,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM airplane LEFT JOIN county ON airplane.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID where airplane.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into airplane (id, year, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, fuel_type, activity_level, fuel_annual_usage, fuel_sulfur_usage, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, vocs_emission, bc_emission, oc_emission, nh3_emission ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuel_type = #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, activity_level = #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_annual_usage = #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_sulfur_usage = #{fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, vocs_emission = #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
mapper.update:
update airplane
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fuel_type = #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR},
activity_level = #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fuel_annual_usage = #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fuel_sulfur_usage = #{fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
vocs_emission = #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
